description: Try our easy to follow Loaded Sausage Nachos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Nachos,Sausage,Seafood free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Loaded Sausage Nachos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place avocado in a bowl with lime juice and season with salt and pepper. Mash to combine into a guacamole and set aside.

Preheat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add sausage and cook for 2 minutes or until starting to turn golden brown. Add tomato paste, spices, salt, black beans and 2 tbs water and cook for a further 2 minutes or until thick and fragrant.
Arrange corn chips on a serving plate. Spoon over sausage and bean mix. Sprinkle with cheese and top with remaining ingredients. Add guacamole to serve.
